data.name: Clean your shoes rack
data.description:
Back story

Your beloved aunt will visit your house today.The aunt is a very pedant person, the thing she hates the most is the messed shoes rack.You love your aunt so you have decided to clean it before her visit.

Shoes rack

Shoes rack is an array which contains arrays ( shelfs ).Each shelf contains spots for shoes and can differ in size (array length).The spot is an array of length 2. ```javascript let shoesRackExample = [ [ [null, null], [null, null] ], [ [null, null], [null, null] ],[null, null] ] [ [null, null], [null, null] ], ] ```

Shoe

Shoe is represented as a string (minimun length of 2).Shoe can be right or left, it is determined based on the last character of the string.String may ends on digit 1 or 2 which means respectively left and right shoe.If you cant determine if the shoe is left or right we consider it as a damanged one.Not damaged shoe is the one that contains only alpha numeric characters. ```javascript let leftShoe = 'Nike1', rightShoe = 'Nike2', leftBazaarShoe = 'judeSandal1', damagedShoe = 'snicker', damagedShoe2 = 'sni.cker2'; ```

Cleaning proccess

To clean the shoes rack you have to do the following:
  • Remove shoes that are damaged
  • Remove shoes that does not have a pair
  • Removed shoe should be replaced with `null` value
  • Make each shoe in correct place in shelf spot ( left shoe as first )
  • Order of the pairs of shoes does not matter
